Examples on how to use refinegems

[1]:

# imports
import refinegems as rg

You can load models

[2]:

model = rg.ioload_model_cobra('../../data/e_coli_core.xml')

[5]:

rg.investigate.get_egc(model)

[5]:
BOF objective value
0 ATP 0.0
1 NADH 0.0
2 NADPH 0.0
3 Q8H2 0.0
